description: Number of distinct primes of the form 4k+1 dividing n minus number of distinct primes of the form 4k+3 dividing n.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
formula: Additive with a(p^e) = 0 if p = 2, 1 if p = 1 (mod 4), -1 if p = 3 (mod 4).From _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 07 2013: (Start)a(n) = A005089(n) - A005091(n).a(A221264(n)) < 0.a(A078613(n)) = 0.a(A221265(n)) > 0.(End)a(A267099(n)) = -a(n). - _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 03 2016
prog: (Haskell)a005094 n = a005089 n - a005091 n  -- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 07 2013
crossrefs: Cf. A079635 (difference when counted with multiplicity).
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More precise definition from _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 03 2016
